events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue was identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request regarding the wrong item.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you received the wrong item and need a refund. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and upload a photo of the item you received to process your refund?
My order number is 123456789. I attached the photo showing the incorrect item that was delivered to me.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately, and you should see it credited back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate how fast you're handling this refund process.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. If you have any further questions, please let us know.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was confirmed received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
